an10.16:3.1: 16 Worthy of Offerings Dedicated to the Gods
an10.16:4.1: “Mendicants, there are ten people worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a teacher’s offering, and worthy of greeting with folded palms. They are a supreme field of merit for the world.
an10.16:4.3: A Realized One, a Perfect One, a fully awakened Buddha; a Buddha awakened for themselves; one freed both ways; one freed by wisdom; a direct witness; one attained to view; one freed by faith; a follower by faith; a follower of principles; a member of the spiritual family.
an10.16:4.4: These ten people are worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a teacher’s offering, and worthy of greeting with folded palms. They are a supreme field of merit for the world.”
